articles.title: Bruins’ Jeremy Swayman gets into goalie fight with Andrei Vasilevskiy in outdoor game
articles.description:
Swayman and Vasilevskiy dropped the gloves in front of over 74,000 fans at Raymond James Stadium.

The post Bruins’ Jeremy Swayman gets into goalie fight with Andrei Vasilevskiy in outdoor game appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jeremy Swayman fought Andrei Vasilevskiy during the outdoor game in Tampa.
Over 74,000 fans attended the game at Raymond James Stadium on February 1.
The fight highlights the growing intensity of Bruins' rivalries, engaging local fans.

articles.title: Suspect charged with murder after mother and son shot to death in Fall River
articles.description:
Arlington Cole, 54, faces two counts of murder and one count of unlawful possession of a firearm.

The post Suspect charged with murder after mother and son shot to death in Fall River appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Arlington Cole, 54, charged with murder of mother and son in Fall River.
Cole faces two murder counts and one firearm possession charge.
Incident raises concerns about gun violence in nearby Boston communities.

articles.title: Dozens rescued by N.H. fire officials after ski lift malfunctions in bitter cold
articles.description:
With three fire departments working together, nearly 60 people were rescued from the lift in under an hour and a half.

The post Dozens rescued by N.H. fire officials after ski lift malfunctions in bitter cold appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nearly 60 skiers were rescued from a malfunctioning lift in New Hampshire.
Three fire departments collaborated to complete the rescue in under 90 minutes.
Boston residents should be aware of potential ski trip safety concerns this winter.

articles.title: Former Mass. state senator receives more prison time for fraud
articles.description:
Dean Tran, 50, was sentenced to 11 months in federal prison. He is already in prison for other fraud charges.

The post Former Mass. state senator receives more prison time for fraud appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former state senator Dean Tran sentenced to 11 months for fraud.
Tran, 50, is already serving time for previous fraud convictions.
Increased scrutiny on public officials may affect future political trust in Boston.

articles.title: Bruins’ Fraser Minten named NHL Rookie of the Month
articles.description:
“He was a steal for us."

The post Bruins’ Fraser Minten named NHL Rookie of the Month appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fraser Minten named NHL Rookie of the Month for February 2026.
Minten's performance has significantly boosted Bruins' morale and fan engagement.
His success highlights the Bruins' strong scouting and player development efforts.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown has 30 points, 13 rebounds as Celtics coast to 107-79 win over Bucks
articles.description:
Derrick White added 17 points, eight assists and seven rebounds, and Neemias Queta had 14 points and eight boards as the Celtics won their second straight game.

The post Jaylen Brown has 30 points, 13 rebounds as Celtics coast to 107-79 win over Bucks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics defeated Bucks 107-79 on February 1, 2026.
Jaylen Brown scored 30 points and grabbed 13 rebounds.
Celtics' win boosts morale ahead of upcoming home games.

articles.title: 7 people are presumed dead after their Gloucester fishing boat sank. Here’s how they’ll be remembered.
articles.description:
Many of the crew members who perished in Friday’s fishing tragedy were locals, according to their loved ones.

The post 7 people are presumed dead after their Gloucester fishing boat sank. Here’s how they’ll be remembered. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seven crew members are presumed dead after a Gloucester fishing boat sank on February 1.
Victims included local fishermen, deeply mourned by their families and the community.
The tragedy highlights the dangers of commercial fishing in Massachusetts waters.
